name: TATER EVADER
description:
TATER EVADER!     🐦🐦🐦

_________________________________________________________

You dropped some Honey Gold potatoes at a picnic, and they GAINED SENTIENCE, realized you were going to eat them, got mad, and started firing TATERIKENS at you! Try to survive as long as you can!

Use the arrow keys to evade the angry taters and their taterikens! If you touch either, you die and game ends. Refresh the page!

(If you want the score / tater number on screen while playing, bigger version is here: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=34264 )

Sadly not minified enough to qualify: 650 chars, so THREE TWEETS. And I know it ain't #TweetTweetTweetJam, so......  (Thx to @2DArray on Twitter for minifying help!)


WORLD RECORD SO FAR: 60.2s, Taters (E:) 22.
